item.title: ![CDATA[World of Warcraft maker to end anonymous forum logins]]
item.description: ![CDATA[A row erupts after the firm behind World of Warcraft announced that users of its sites would have to use their real names.]]

item.title: ![CDATA[Blizzard retreats from forcing real names in Warcraft forums]]
item.description: ![CDATA[The suggestion that WoW players should use their real names on the game's forums turned out to be surprisingly unpopular. But where is the point when it becomes necessary?]]

item.title: ![CDATA[Uganda blasts kill 74; Somali Islamists claim responsibilty]]
item.description: ![CDATA[A Somali Islamist militant group -- al-Shabaab -- issued a direct claim of responsibility Monday for a string of three bombings in Uganda that left at least 74 people dead.]]

item.title: ![CDATA[Blizzard Backs off Forcing Users to Post under Real Names | Digital Trends]]
item.description: ![CDATA[After deciding to require forum posters to use their real names when posting, the makers of World of Warcraft and Starcraft has changed its mind and will abandon the RealID system that would have required forum posters to post under their real names.]]

item.title: ![CDATA[Best of Chiptune [8 bit music, retro visuals]]]
item.description:
![CDATA[This is a compilation of the best chiptune songs.
Blog post about the music (hungarian language): http://numlockholmes.blog.hu/2010/08/28/8_bites_zene (magyar nyelv)
All of the songs (and more) can be found at this site, in special file format: http://keygenmusic.net/
You can download here a freeware player program, for this special format (also you can convert to mp3 with this): http://www.modplug.com/
There are some interesting online chiptune radio stations: http://kohina.com/ http://nolife-radio.com/]]

item.title: ![CDATA[Eva Hart speaks about her memories of the Titanic . . survivor interview]]
item.description: ![CDATA[* Interview from 1993. Eva Hart (born 1905. Died 1996) A great insight about the sinking of the Titanic. Amazing to hear her say "I saw that ship sink". I'm not exactly sure when this was recorded but i think it was the early 1990's.]]

item.title: ![CDATA[Amazon servers cut off WikiLeaks]]
item.description: ![CDATA[Amazon, whose servers have been home to WikiLeaks since earlier this week, has quit hosting it, the website behind a massive disclosure of controversial documents said Wednesday.]]

item.title: ![CDATA[Sam Harris: Islam Is Not a Religion of Peace]]
item.description:
![CDATA[Complete video at: http://fora.tv/2010/11/10/Sam_Harris_Can_Science_Determine_Human_Values
Author Sam Harris argues that Islam -- like most religions -- is not simply a peaceful faith misrepresented by extremists. "The only problem with Islamic fundamentalism are the fundamentals of Islam," says Harris. "To call Islam a religion of peace ... is completely delusional."
-----
In this highly anticipated, explosive new book, the author of The End of Faith and Letter to a Christian Nation calls for an end to religion's monopoly on morality and human values. In The Moral Landscape: How Science Can Determine Human Values, Sam Harris tears down the wall between scientific facts and human values to dismantle the most common justification for religious faith -- that a moral system cannot be based on science.
The End of Faith ignited a worldwide debate about the validity of religion. In its aftermath, Harris discovered that most people, from secular scientists to religious fundamenta]]
